properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 5 at 10:54PM EST until February 7 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Baxter
The Cumberland River at Pineville

The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Cumberland River at Baxter.
* from late tonight to Friday afternoon.
* At 1045 PM EST the estimated stage was 9.8 feet.
* Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to a crest naring 16.0 feet on
Thursday and then begin to recede. The river will run
high through Friday.
* At 16.0 feet...Low lying areas flood.
properties.instruction:
Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 1100 AM on Thursday.
